    • Class client.userInterface.panels.tetris.TetrisPanel

      class TetrisPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boards
          Board[] boards
          Array of game boards active in this panel (e.g., 1 for single player, 2 for multiplayer).
        • gameLoopTimer
          Timer gameLoopTimer
          Timer responsible for executing the game loop.
        • gameOver
          boolean gameOver
          Flag indicating if the game has ended.
        • keyInputHandler
          KeyInputHandler keyInputHandler
          Handles keyboard input events for controlling the game.
        • mainPanel
          MainPanel mainPanel
          Reference to the main application panel for navigation and resource access.

    • Class client.userInterface.panels.tetris.twoPlayerPanels.OnlineTwoPlayersPanel

      class OnlineTwoPlayersPanel extends TwoPlayersTetrisPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardsSocket
          Socket boardsSocket
          The active socket connection to the server (or proxied to the opponent).
        • connectionLost
          boolean connectionLost
          Flag indicating if the network connection has been unexpectedly dropped.
        • receiverBoardInputHandler
          ReceiverBoardInputHandler receiverBoardInputHandler
          Handler responsible for decoding network messages and applying them to the remote board representation.
        • rivalGameOver
          boolean rivalGameOver
          Flag indicating if the remote player has topped out (Game Over).
        • seed
          long seed
          The random seed used to initialize both boards deterministically.
        • senderBoardOutputHandler
          SenderBoardOutputHandler senderBoardOutputHandler
          Handler responsible for encoding and sending local events to the network.
